155.movie_plot: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

168.movie_plot: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

63.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)

130.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)

137.movie_plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

8.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

134.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

146.movie_plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

58.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

86.movie_plot: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

126.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
126.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

116.movie_plot: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

57.movie_name: Good, The Bad and The Ugly, The (1966)

109.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
109.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
